name: Top Down Portal
description:
Small project that recreates Portal on a top down perspective.

This game was created only to recreate the mechanics of a portal in a 2D game so it's pretty short, only 10 levels. Enjoy.

Made with Godot.

You can see the source Code at: https://github.com/XenokNyx/2D_Portal

Controls
  • WASD - Move
  • E - Grab Cube
  • Left Click - Blue Portal
  • Right Click - Orange Portal
